colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI GSER KHANG RDO RJE 'CHANG GIS ^SKYABS MGON PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA LA ZHUS PAS DENG SANG MDO SMAD DU DGRA JAG DANG PHYUG NAD SOGS NYER 'TSE SNA TSOGS 'BYUNG 'DUG PAS DE BZLOG THABS GANG LA 'BAD DGOS ZHUS PA'I LAN LA, DGRA JAG DANG PHYUG NAD MA ZAD ME CHU SOGS KYI 'JIGS PA'I NGO YOD PA'I DE BZLOG THABS SHO LO KA GNYIS PO 'DI THAMS CAD KYIS RGYUN 'DON LA 'BAD NA RIM GYIS ZHI GSUNGS SO, ,DGE'O, ,)
